AI_Instructions: Design the main object {Object_Style} (e.g., as a plush balloon, pillow, or inflatable toy). Using smooth matte fabric texture, no plastic feel, with wrinkles and stitching. Place on a minimalist {Background_Color} background.
Primary_Message: Playful, sculptural images of the Cremo freezer as a soft item.
Prompt_Template: Design the {Main_Object} {Object_Style}. Using smooth matte fabric texture, Do not have a plastic feeling. complemented by subtle fabric wrinkles and stitching to emphasize its inflated effect. The shape should be slightly irregular and soft, with gentle shadows and lighting to highlight its volume and realism. Place it on a clean, minimalist {Background_Color} background to maintain a playful sculptural aesthetic.

AI_Instructions: (Workflow: Inpainting) Requires 3 inputs from N8N: 1. Original_Image_URL, 2. Mask_Image_URL, 3. The {Edit_Instruction} pulled from the Options file.
Primary_Message: A library of pre-defined prompts for fixing images.

AI_Instructions: Create a cute 3D isometric tile rendering of the Cremo freezer on a simple base. Include 3D characters. The freezer must be the central element. The scene must use {Base_Color} and {Background_Color} as the dominant color palette.
Primary_Message: Cute, 3D isometric scenes featuring the Cremo freezer with people and kids.
Prompt_Template: A rounded, cute isometric tile 3D rendering. The central element is a Cremo glass-top ice cream freezer (which is white) set on a simple 3D base. Around the freezer, {quantity} cute 3D characters ({subject}) {action}. The scene creates a {mood} atmosphere. The entire scene uses a color palette dominated by {Base_Color} and {Background_Color}, allowing characters (skin tones, clothes) and the freezer to have their own natural details. 1:1 ratio.

AI_Instructions: Focus only on the Cremo glass-top freezer. The freezer is the hero. The background should be clean, in a studio. Must use {Primary_Color} and {Secondary_Color} as accents.
Primary_Message: Professional, clean studio images of the Cremo freezer itself.
Prompt_Template: A professional studio shot of {quantity} {subject} {action}, set in a {environment}. The scene uses {lighting} to create a {mood} atmosphere. {shotType}. The image must be high-quality and use {Primary_Color} and {Secondary_Color} as accents on the freezer or background.
